text: Eadwine was Abbot of Abingdon. Eadwine was the brother of Ealdorman Ælfric of Hampshire, who purchased the abbacy for him in 985; he died in 990. == References == * Kelly, S. E. 2000. Charters of Abingdon, part 1. Anglo-Saxon Charters 7. == External links == * Category:Abbots of Abingdon Category:990 deaths Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Eadwine of Abingdon
